name: The arithmetic mean of the object
instruction:
Write a function `averageFromObject` that takes an object with three properties `a`, `b` and `c`.

An example of an object that will be passed to the function:
```javascript
{
  a: 10,
  b: 20,
  c: 30
}
```

The function should return the arithmetic mean of the properties `a`, `b` and `c` of the object.

An example of running the function:
```javascript
averageFromObject({a: 10, b: 20, c: 30}) // 20
```
